text: Infectious genital ulcers . . « Small vesicles or ulcers on erythematous base Herpes simplex virus . « Mild lymphadenopathy . . « Larger, deep ulcers with gray/yellow exudate Haemophilus ducreyi . . « Well-demarcated borders & soft, friable base (chancroid) « Severe lymphadenopathy that may suppurate Treponema pallidum « Single ulcer (chancre) (syphilis) » Regular borders & hard base Chlamydia trachomatis serovars L1- | « Small, shallow ulcers (often missed) L3 (lymphogranuloma venereum) « Can progress to painful, fluctuant adenitis (buboes)
